text: @realDonaldTrump I dig what you said, everything you said at the White House Brief regarding China! IT IS ABOUT TIME AMERICANS COME 1st! They did kill people all over the world with their coronavirus. Yeah, why in heck does America pay the most amount of money...I'm proud of your decisions
